Powered by professional experience in lighting projects, and an additional multi-discipline background in architecture, interior, and landscape lighting, we can provide simple and seamless solutions to meet and exceed even the toughest project needs.
aboutSection.desc_two: At Lightech, one of our main strengths is a permanent variety of products and experienced professionals in the field. This combination has developed a host of capabilities designed to generate sophisticated turnkey lighting solutions.

servicesSection.title: OUR SERVICES
servicesSection.subtitle: Comprehensive Lighting Solutions
servicesSection.desc_one: Our engineers and lighting specialists offer the unique ability to provide world-class lighting, controls and renewable energy concepts.

services.title: Innovative
services.description: Innovative and high-tech lighting fixtures range from decorative to technical, interior, and/or exterior applications, including special or custom-made-fixtures.

services.title: The know-how
services.description: The know-how to create the most innovative lighting features and schemes while saving the environment (light pollution, energy conservation, and cost restraints).

services.title: Different solutions
services.description: Different solutions are offered according to the customerâ€™s request and budget availability.

services.title: Full cooperation
services.description: Full cooperation between our team, international partners, customers, and international lighting designers.

testimonialSection.title: TESTIMONIALS
testimonialSection.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
testimonialSection.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our clients have to say about their experience working with Lightech.

testimonials.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
testimonials.text: Working with Lightech was an exceptional experience. Their team's expertise in lighting design transformed our commercial building into a stunning visual landmark. Their attention to detail and understanding of our needs exceeded our expectations.

testimonials.name: Sara Al-Qahtani
testimonials.text: Lightech provided innovative lighting solutions for our luxury residential project. Their understanding of how lighting affects spaces helped create the perfect ambiance throughout the property. Highly professional and responsive team.

testimonials.name: Abdullah Rahman
testimonials.text: We've been working with Lightech for our mall's lighting needs for over 5 years. Their maintenance service is prompt and reliable, and their lighting solutions have helped us reduce energy costs while improving the shopping experience.

partnersSection.title: OUR PARTNERS
partnersSection.subtitle: Trusted By Industry Leaders
partnersSection.description: We collaborate with leading brands and companies to deliver exceptional lighting solutions for projects of all sizes.

features.title: Quality Products
features.descriptions: We work with the industry's leading manufacturers to ensure we provide our clients with high-quality, durable lighting products that meet international standards.

features.title: Expert Installation
features.descriptions: Our team of certified technicians ensures professional installation of all lighting systems, following best practices and safety standards for optimal performance.

features.title: Ongoing Support
features.descriptions: We provide comprehensive maintenance services and technical support to ensure your lighting systems continue to perform at their best for years to come.

contactSection.title: CONTACT US
contactSection.subtitle: Get In Touch
contactSection.desciption: Have a project in mind or need lighting consultation? Reach out to us and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

header.title: About Lightech
header.description: A dynamic lighting company with a wide array of activities and services, powered by professional experience since 2005.

ourStory.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: Founded in 2005, Lightech has established itself as a leading lighting company in Saudi Arabia. Our journey began with a vision to transform spaces through innovative lighting solutions.

Powered by professional experience in lighting projects, and an additional multi-discipline background in architecture, interior, and landscape lighting, we can provide simple and seamless solutions to meet and exceed even the toughest project needs.

At Lightech, one of our main strengths is a permanent variety of products and experienced professionals in the field. This combination has developed a host of capabilities designed to generate sophisticated turnkey lighting solutions.

cards.heading: Our Mission
cards.body: To transform spaces through innovative lighting solutions that enhance the beauty, functionality, and sustainability of architectural environments while exceeding our clients' expectations through excellence in design, technology, and service.

cards.heading: Our Vision
cards.body: To be the leading lighting solutions provider in Saudi Arabia and beyond, recognized for our innovation, sustainability, and commitment to creating exceptional lighting experiences that inspire and transform spaces.

items.title: Market Leadership
items.description: Maintain and expand our position as a leading lighting solutions provider in Saudi Arabia.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Continuously develop and implement innovative lighting solutions and technologies.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Promote energy-efficient and environmentally sustainable lighting solutions.

items.title: Client Success
items.description: Ensure client satisfaction through exceptional service and support.

header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: Our engineers and lighting specialists offer the unique ability to provide world-class lighting, controls and renewable energy concepts.

categories.title: LIGHTING
categories.summary: End-to-end lighting design, supply, and turnkey delivery for architectural, interior, and landscape applications.
offerings: Concept and schematic lighting design
Lux calculations, photometric studies, and dialux deliverables
Fixture selection, specification, and value engineering
Architectural, interior, facade, and landscape lighting
Hospitality, retail, office, and industrial lighting layouts
LED retrofits and energy-efficiency upgrades
Emergency and egress lighting compliance
Supply, installation, testing, and commissioning (SITC)

categories.title: WIRING DEVICES
categories.summary: Premium wiring devices and accessories for reliable power distribution and user-centric interfaces.
offerings: Switches, sockets, dimmers, and outlet systems
USB/Typeâ€‘C charging modules and floor boxes
Hospitality and office accessory grids
Weatherproof and IK-rated enclosures
Modular plates and finishes to match interiors
Surge, RCD/RCBO, and AFCI protection integration

categories.title: CONTROL SYSTEMS
categories.summary: Smart lighting controls for comfort, efficiency, and centralized management across single sites and portfolios.
offerings: DALI/DALI-2, 0â€“10V, and DMX control architectures
Wireless controls: BLE, Zigbee, Thread/Matter
Occupancy, vacancy, and daylight harvesting sensors
Scene setting, scheduling, and timeclock logic
BMS integration via BACnet/Modbus/IP
Touch panels, keypads, and mobile app control
Analytics dashboards and remote monitoring

categories.title: RENEWABLE ENERGY SYSTEMS
categories.summary: Solar-powered solutions and hybrid systems that complement efficient lighting for sustainable facilities.
offerings: On-grid and hybrid solar PV design and installation
Solar street and area lighting systems
Battery storage sizing and selection
Inverter, MPPT, and protection coordination
Energy audits and ROI modeling
O&M plans and performance monitoring
